atk_abil: Normal Attack: Attack enemies with multiple snake arrows. When hit by a snake arrow, enemies are slowed, suffer lower accuracy, and cannot be healed.
Skill Attack: Attacks enemies with many snake arrows. When hit by a snake arrow, enemies are slowed, suffer lower accuracy, and cannot be healed.
Special Ability 1: Increases movement and attack speed of Orc and Undead by 2%
Special Ability 2: Increases the basic speed of the game by 2%.

Inner Passion: Increases all abilities (attack/defense/HP) of units by 2 levels. ([Inner passion] can only be used in stages. [Inner passion] is accrued when applied, but the unit abilities cannot increase to more than +100 level. This is activated even when units are in the Time Shop.)
atk_abil_sr: Normal Attack: Attack enemies with multiple snake arrows. When hit by a snake arrow, enemies are slowed, suffer lower accuracy, and cannot be healed.
Skill Attack: Attacks enemies with many snake arrows. When hit by a snake arrow, enemies are slowed, suffer lower accuracy, and cannot be healed.
Special Ability 1: Increases movement and attack speed of Orc and Undead by 6%
Special Ability 2: Increases the basic speed of the game by 5%.

Inner Passion: Increases all abilities (attack/defense/HP) of units by 5 levels. ([Inner passion] can only be used in stages. [Inner passion] is accrued when applied, but the unit abilities cannot increase to more than +100 level. This is activated even when units are in the Time Shop.)

buffs.description: Increases all abilities (attack/defense/HP) of units even if Medusa is in the Time Shop. (Only applies to stages) (5-star 2 levels, 6-star 5 levels, Max 100 levels).
buffs.name: Inner Passion
